quest: Brave the perilous grocery store to acquire an ice cream flavour you have never had.

followUps.quest: Build the most delicious looking bowl of ice cream you have ever had in your life.
Sprawl out on your bed/sofa, eat the ice cream while calling a friend to cry. Like one of those old 1970s teenage girls going through a breakup.

quest: Take a photo of the weirdest thing that you can see now

followUps.quest: Physically draw that photo. Don't worry if it's ugly, it is already the weirdest thing you can see anyways
Send your drawing to someone you trust with zero context

quest: Get pocket sized snacks that you can easily hide

followUps.quest: Go to the cinema and watch the next showing, regardless of the movie
Try to get in with your snacks without getting caught

quest: Go on Google Maps to find a restaurant that you have never been to before. Don't think, just head there now

followUps.quest: Order a drink and something to eat
Let the staff know that this is your first time leaving your cave in 15 years

quest: Choose your favourite song on your preferred streaming service. Sit there and listen to it with your eyes closed

followUps.quest: Go to the next song in the playlist, now get up and dance to it. No skipping, the next song has to be it.
Let your streaming service of choice choose the next song for you, listen to it fully with your eyes closed.

quest: Buy a model kit, plane, ship, car, robot, anything

followUps.quest: Put on a long podcast and make yourself a nice drink
Take your time to build and finish it. Embrace the nerd

quest: Text someone you care about. Or if you want more of a challenge, text someone at the bottom of your personal messaging app

followUps.quest: Call someone you care about. Or if you want more of a challenge, call someone at the bottom of your personal messaging app
Send them your favourite movie/tv show

quest: Take a trip to your favourite store.

followUps.quest: Take your time to browse through every section, find something that you really really like and want to buy.
Don't buy it. Put it back!

quest: Remember a meal that you had when you were younger, your favourite homemade meal.

followUps.quest: Get the ingredients and make it
Show it to someone you know that remembers or might like this meal

quest: Take a nap. Yes, go take a nap. Just lay there if you can't sleep

followUps.quest: Does that feel good? Now, go to your fridge to grab something to eat. It can be something small.
Bring the food or drink back to bed and enjoy it there. You lazy pig.
